description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Accelerate 2016
https://gotocon.com/accelerate-2016

Ade McCormack - Digital Strategist & Near Futurist at Auridian

ABSTRACT
The world is changing. As is the world of business. It would appear that the changes we are witnessing are technology driven. As you will find out in this presentation, technology is simply a facilitator to an underlying force that has been in [...]
